name: .IMAZINGAPP
summary: Learn about .IMAZINGAPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an IMAZINGAPP file in iMazing (Mac, Windows). To restore the data your IMAZINGAPP file contains:
Open iMazing with your iPhone connected and select Manage Apps.
Open the drop-down menu and select Restore App Data.
You can then drag-and-drop or browse to your IMAZINGAPP file to restore the data it contains. iMazing will re-install the associated app if needed.
